name: mikroe.click.diffpress4
short_description: Diff Press 4 Click is a compact add-on board that can measure differential pressure. This board features the SM9336-BCE-S-250-000, a digital pressure and altimeter sensor module from TE Connectivity. The SM9336-BCE-S-250-000 has a configurable host interface that supports I2C serial communication and measures pressure in a wide range with an accuracy of 3%. It comes as calibrated and temperature-compensated with high reliability/long-term stability. It operates in a compensated temperature range of -20°C to 85°C, ensuring stable operation under extreme conditions.
